name: Mimic Logic
description:
What is Mimic Logic?
A procedurally generated roguelike logic puzzle game where you can speak to treasure boxes.
Listen to what the boxes have to say, find the lying Mimics, and open up the remaining boxes to collect treasure!
If you accidentally open up a Mimic, it's game over!
Use the gear and items you've collected from treasure boxes to beat enemies and conquer the dungeon.
The puzzles are procedurally generated, so you can solve them to your heart's content!
